original_text: Then Isaiah said, ‘Take some figs to make a medicine.’ So the king's servants did what Isaiah had said. They put the medicine on Hezekiah's boil. He became well again.
korean_text: 이사야가 이르되 무화과 반죽을 가져오라 하매 무리가 가져다가 그 상처에 놓으니 나으니라

sentences.original_text: Take some figs to make a medicine
So the king's servants did what Isaiah had said
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 왕의 종들은 이사야가 말한 대로 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They put the medicine on Hezekiah's boil
